component.name: O20.Word
component.summary: MS Word on the Linux desktop.

description.p: O20.Word is the new MS Word alternative for Linux. Built on Qt5, KDE, and Flatpak, O20.Word is complete with a streamlined and modern UI, AutoSave, support for the ODT and XHTML document formats, and a privacy respecting assistant, Spectrum, which will help you write documents faster.
